card.name: Starlight Dome
card.text: Whenever a battle you control is defeated or whenever a creature you control dies, put a charge counter on Starlight Dome. Once during each of your turns, you may cast a permanent spell from your hand or graveyard with mana value less than or equal to the number of charge counters on Starlight Dome without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Project Starlight
card.text: Each player reveals their hand and library. Exile all enchantment cards, non-Human creature cards, and planeswalker cards from the battlefield, from graveyards, and from among the revealed cards. Each player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

card.name: Genomic Blueprint
card.text: As Genomic Blueprint enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name. Triggered abilities of sources with the chosen name don't trigger.

card.name: Liminal Vista
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature if it dealt combat damage to a battle or planeswalker this turn.

card.name: Unseen Pursuer
card.text: Menace During you turn, other Assassins you control and noncreature permanents you control have deathtouch.

card.name: Ultimate Weapon
card.text: Trample When Ultimate Weapon enters the battlefield, if it was cast, destroy target noncreature permanent an opponent controls. Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Collective Revenant
card.text: You may have Collective Revenant assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked. Whenever another permanent enters the battlefield under your control, for each kind of counter on it, put another counter of that kind on it or remove one from it.

card.name: Flesh Siphon
card.text: {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {T}: Create a 3/3 green Human Horror creature token. Activate only as a sorcery and only if seven or more cards are exiled with Flesh Siphon.

card.name: Total Annihilation
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. A creature attacking an Operation alone has menace.) When Total Annihilation enters the battlefield or is defeated, destroy target permanent an opponent controls.

card.name: Multiversal Passage
card.text: As Multiversal Passage enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Then you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped. Multiversal Passage is the chosen type.

card.name: Nodal Tyrant
card.text: Flying, ward {2} Other Drones you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Drowned Mire
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Activate only if you control an Island.

card.name: Colonize
card.text: Gain control of target land unless its controller sacrifices two creatures.

card.name: Starlight Researcher
card.text: Starlight Researcher enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Black-Op Vanguard
card.text: Whenever Black-Op Vanguard attacks a player or permanent, if no other creatures are attacking that player or permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Black-Op Vanguard.

card.name: Starlight Enforcer
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: Consummate Thief
card.text: Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.)

card.name: Aerial Operative
card.text: Flying Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.)

card.name: X-Open Pursuer
card.text: When X-Open Pursuer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

card.name: Spectrograph Analyst
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Spectrograph Analyst gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Crackdown Enforcer
card.text: Vigilance At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast or copied a noncreature spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Crackdown Enforcer.

card.name: Astralnaut Deployer
card.text: Vigilance Battle spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Troop Transport
card.text: Flying {2}, Discard Troop Transport: Search your library for a basic Plains card or a card named Wetworks Lens, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Containment Unit
card.text: When Containment Unit enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Containment Unit leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Into the Night
card.text: When Into the Night enters the battlefield, target nonland permanent an opponent controls phases out until Into the Night leaves the battlefield. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Haunted Crossroads
card.text: Haunted Crossroads deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Precision Strike
card.text: Exile target artifact, battle, or enchantment.

card.name: Consciousness Uploader
card.text: Nonland permanents are enchantments in addition to their other types. The same is true for permanent spells and nonland permanent cards that aren't on the battlefield.

card.name: Protracted Occupation
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, if it was attacking a player or permanent that no other creature was attacking, create a token that's a copy of it.

card.name: Build a Colony on a Grave
card.text: Exile all nonland permanents.

card.name: Assault Valkyrie
card.text: Flying, double strike Whenever a battle you control is defeated, put a +1/+1 counter on Assault Valkyrie. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Out of Time and Place
card.text: Exile a creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under it owner's control. Then repeat this process X more times.

card.name: Shadowy Manipulator
card.text: Flash Noncreature permanents entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

card.name: L-Bit Sentinel
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast battle spells from the top of your library. Whenever you cast a battle spell, create two 1/1 white Advisor creature tokens with first strike and "This creature can't block."

card.name: Crisis of Faith
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.

card.name: Twin-Rotor Transport
card.text: Flying, vigilance Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.)

card.name: Corporate Cut-Out
card.text: Vigilance When Corporate Cut-Out enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with power 2 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Radiological Observer
card.text: Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.) Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Radiological Observer.

card.name: Grizzled Wardog
card.text: Whenever Grizzled Wardog attacks a player or permanent, if no other creatures are attacking that player or permanent, return target battle card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Embedded Observer
card.text: Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.) {T}: Target creature you control gains shielded until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)

card.name: Controlled Opposition
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks a player or permanent, if no other creatures are attacking that player or permanent, create a 1/1 white Advisor creature token with first strike and "This creature can't block."

card.name: Mission Controller
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, if Mission Controller has first strike, it gains double strike until end of turn. Otherwise, it gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Architect of War
card.text: When Architect of War enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 colorless Drone artifact creature token. Drones you control have vigilance.

card.name: Barrack Destroyer
card.text: Flying Whenever another creature you control attacks a battle, untap it.

card.name: Stealth Raid
card.text: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Tap target creature. • Put a stun counter on target creature. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Last Known Sighting
card.text: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, you may pay {4}. If you don't, return that creature to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: A Witness at Midnight
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Advisor creature token with first strike and "This creature can't block."

card.name: X-Open Harrier
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.)

card.name: Spectral Doll
card.text: Whenever Spectral Doll deals combat damage to a player or battle, draw a card.

card.name: Unstable Asset
card.text: Flash When Unstable Asset enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: L-Bit Skytyrant
card.text: Flying Foretell {U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Eternal Audience
card.text: When Eternal Audience enters the battlefield, mill two cards, then you may put an instant, sorcery, or battle card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Infiltration Specialist
card.text: Vigilance Infiltration Specialist can't be blocked as long as it's attacking a battle.

card.name: Warped Amalgam
card.text: {2}, Discard Warped Amalgam: Search your library for a basic Island card or a card named Wetworks Lens, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Autonomous Bomber
card.text: Flying When Autonomous Bomber enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Can't Rain All the Time
card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. Untap it.

card.name: Deny Everything
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target spell. • Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Dream
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle. Draw a card.

card.name: Uncover
card.text: Surveil 2, then draw two cards. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Spectral Capture
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a blue Spirit creature with flying and base power and toughness 1/1. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)

card.name: Extraordinary Rendition
card.text: Target artifact or creature's owner puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Paraphysical Investigation
card.text: Paraphysical Investigation enters the battlefield with a time counter on it. Whenever you cast a spell with mana value equal to the number of time counters on Paraphysical Investigation, put a time counter on it. Then if there are eight or more time counters on it, exile it and take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Intrusive Intelligence
card.text: Draw X cards. If this spell was foretold, instead surveil 3, then draw X cards. Foretell {X}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Biological Entity
card.text: Flying Biological Entity enters the battlefield tapped with four stun counters on it. Whenever you draw a card other than the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, untap Biological Entity.

card.name: Emergency Hotline
card.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control twice. You may choose new targets for the copies. Foretell {2}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Possession Engine
card.text: When Possession Engine enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls for as long as you control Possession Engine. That creature can't attack or block for as long as you control Possession Engine. Crew 3

card.name: Unidentified Operative
card.text: Flash When Unidentified Operative enters the battlefield, counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard.

card.name: Inexorable Ironclad
card.text: Whenever Inexorable Ironclad becomes the target of a spell, create a 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature with flying. Tap two untapped creatures you control: Inexorable Ironclad can't be blocked this turn. You may have it phase out.

card.name: Extermination Engine
card.text: When Extermination Engine enters the battlefield, return up to one other target artifact or battle to its owner's hand.

card.name: Subject Suppressor
card.text: Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.) Whenever a battle you control is defeated, draw a card.

card.name: Lingering Revenant
card.text: When Lingering Revenant enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard a card. Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Anticontaminator
card.text: Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.) Whenever Anticontaminator attacks, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: L-Bit Annihilator
card.text: Vigilance Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may have L-Bit Annihilator's base power and toughness become X/X until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value.

card.name: Rendition Czar
card.text: Whenever you cast a battle spell, create a 2/2 colorless Drone artifact creature token. Whenever a battle you control is defeated, put a +1/+1 counter on each Drone you control.

card.name: Temerity
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying. When Temerity is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Grip of Anxiety
card.text: The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library. If they put it on the bottom, they may draw a card.

card.name: Disappear into the Crowd
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to creatures and players this turn.

card.name: Monumental Scorn
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Impossible Object
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to foretell a card from your hand or cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand. {2}, Sacrifice Impossible Object: Draw a card.

card.name: Collude with Power
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard a card if Collude with Power was cast from your hand. Foretell {2}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Expendable Infiltrator
card.text: Whenever Expendable Infiltrator attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Interference Drone
card.text: Flying Interference Drone enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Apprentice Astralnaut
card.text: Whenever you cast a battle spell or whenever a battle you control is defeated, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Eager Conscript
card.text: Whenever Eager Conscript attacks a player or permanent, if no other creatures are attacking that player or permanent, Eager Conscript gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Contract Eradicator
card.text: When Contract Eradicator enters the battlefield, if it was cast from exile, each opponent discards a card. Foretell {2}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Unmarked Transport
card.text: Flying When Unmarked Transport dies, create a 1/1 white Advisor creature token with first strike and "This creature can't block."

card.name: Nuclear Technician
card.text: During your turn, Nuclear Technician has deathtouch. When Nuclear Technician enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Spectral Tormentor
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each battle and/or creature card in your graveyard.

card.name: Unidentified Entity
card.text: Ward—Discard a card. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player discards a card.) {2}, Discard Unidentified Entity: Search your library for a basic Swamp card or a card named Wetworks Lens, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Radiation Leak
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets -2/-2 and gains "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this creature unless you discard a card."

card.name: Made to Disappear
card.text: Draw two cards. You lose 2 life unless a creature died under your control this turn. Foretell {1}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Fall of Man
card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Incriminate
card.text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. That player sacrifices one of them of their choice.

card.name: Descent into Barbarism
card.text: Skip your draw step. You may cast creature spells from your graveyard. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost. Whenever a creature you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Stolen Secrets
card.text: Search target opponent's library for up to three cards with different names, then that player shuffles. That opponent exiles two of those cards, then you may cast the last without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Abduction Craft
card.text: Flying When Abduction Craft enters the battlefield, if it was cast, exile target creature an opponent controls. Whenever you cast a spell with mana value greater than the exiled card, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Massacre Chamber
card.text: Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.) When Massacre Chamber enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Driven by Obsession
card.text: Target opponent chooses a card type. When they do, choose one — • That player reveals their hand and discards all cards of the chosen type. • That player reveals their hand and discards all cards not of the chosen type.

card.name: Paradrop Extractionist
card.text: Flying Whenever Paradrop Extractionist attacks, you may pay 2 life. When you do, choose one — • Return target creature or battle card from your graveyard to your hand. • Draw a card.

card.name: Astralnaut's Demise
card.text: You gain X life. Then choose one or both — • Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. • Remove up to X counters from target permanent.

card.name: Ruthless Outrider
card.text: Whenever Ruthless Outrider deals combat damage to a battle, you may put that many defense counters on up to one target battle an opponent controls.

card.name: Architect of Atrocity
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent loses 1 life. If that spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, instead each opponent loses life equal to Architect of Atrocity's power.

card.name: Starlight Colonist
card.text: Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.) Starlight Colonist can't be blocked as long as a creature died this turn.

card.name: Disappearancer
card.text: Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.) Whenever Disappearancer deals combat damage to a player or battle, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Roadside Revenant
card.text: Flying, deathtouch, haste Foretell {1}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Heartless Executioner
card.text: When Heartless Executioner enters the battlefield, remove up to five counters from target permanent or opponent. (A battle is defeated when its last defense counter is removed.)

card.name: Spatial Aggressor
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent loses 1 life. If that spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Paraphysical Research
card.text: Target creature you control gains deathtouch, lifelink, and shielded until end of turn. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)

card.name: Cry of the Carnarium
card.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Exile all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Network Requisition
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with an argent counter on it. It's a Drone artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: The Right To Defend
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. If that permanent was tapped, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.) Foretell {1}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.text: Exile target artifact.

card.name: Impending Collapse
card.text: Damage can't be prevented this turn. Impending Collapse deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Incinerating Blast
card.text: Incinerating Blast deals 6 damage to target creature. You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: The World That Was
card.text: Each player sacrifices four lands. Then each player discards their hand and draws cards equal to the number of basic lands they sacrificed this way.

card.name: Born of Blood
card.text: For each creature on the battlefield, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 1/1. Those tokens gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. card.text: If this spell was foretold, it can't be countered and damage can't be prevented this turn. Inevitable Depopulation deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker and to each battle you control. Foretell {X}{R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: X-Open Hellkite
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever a battle you control is defeated, create a 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature with flying. {R}, Sacrifice another artifact: X-Open Hellkite gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Constant Surveillance
card.text: Nonbasic lands enter the battlefield tapped unless their controller controls two or fewer other lands. {2}{R}, Sacrifice Constant Surveillance: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Midnight Happening
card.text: Midnight Happening deals 4 damage to any target. Create a number of 1/1 white Advisor creature tokens with first strike and "This creature can't block" equal to the excess damage deal this way.

card.name: Phenomenon Zone
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add {R}. If that spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, create a Treasure token instead. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Stealth Agent
card.text: Haste Whenever Stealth Agent attacks a player, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Sabotage Specialist
card.text: When Sabotage Specialist enters the battlefield, choose one. If it was cast from exile, you may choose both instead. • Each opponent sacrifices an artifact. • Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Mission Specialist
card.text: Menace, reach Whenever a spell or ability causes an opponent to shuffle their library, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Perilous Whistleblower
card.text: Flash When Perilous Whistleblower enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 white Advisor creature token with first strike and "This creature can't block."

card.name: Vengeful Repressor

card.name: Frantic Witness
card.text: Haste Lone wolf (Whenever you attack, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn if it's attacking a player or permanent that no other creatures are attacking.)

card.name: Invasive Colonist
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, Invasive Colonist deals 2 damage to target opponent. If that spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, you may have Invasive Colonist deal damage equal to that spell's mana value instead.

card.name: Convergent Trauma
card.text: Convergent Trauma deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

card.name: Uncaged Paradox
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. It becomes foretold. Its foretell cost is equal to its mana cost. (On a later turn, you may cast it for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Liminal Pulse
card.text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn. If this spell was cast from exile, X is 5. Foretell {R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Proportional Response
card.text: Until end of turn, if a source you control would deal noncombat damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead. Then Proportional Response deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Unmanned Strike
card.text: Create a tapped 2/2 colorless Drone artifact creature token. When you do, up to X target creatures can't block this turn, where X is the number of Drones you control.

card.name: Furnace Pit
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. You may have Furnace Pit deal 2 damage to that creature.

card.name: Crush the Weak
card.text: Crush the Weak deals 2 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Foretell {R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Encounter Zone
card.text: Choose one — • Create a 2/2 colorless Drone artifact creature token. • Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Tactical Encroachment
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control or target battle. If the creature you don't control would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: The Fear of the Beyond
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Commune with Fear
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or battle card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Together in Division
card.text: As Together in Division enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X, where X is the number of creatures you control of the chosen type.

card.name: Jehia Khusam, Partisan
card.text: Trample, haste, ward {2} Whenever a battle you control is defeated, each opponent gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Relentless Engine
card.text: Trample Relentless Engine enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Relentless Engine attacks a player or permanent, if no other creatures are attacking that player or permanent, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Relentless Engine.

card.name: Genomic Tampering
card.text: Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If this spell was cast from exile, X is equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. Foretell {1}{G}{G} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Beacon of Resistance
card.text: Creature spells you control can't be countered. Each other creature you control that's a Citizen or a Rebel gets +1/+1.

card.name: The Secrets of Flesh
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them or from your hand onto the battlefield. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Starlight Reactor
card.text: {X}, {T}, Sacrifice Starlight Reactor: Destroy each artifact and enchantment with mana value X or less. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Embedded Agent

card.name: HTL Draft Archetypes HTL
card.text: {W}{U} LONE WOLF Attack players and battles with solitary creatures to boost your success. {U}{B} OPERATIONS These battles are fought in secret, with solitary attackers. {B}{R} PARADOX Cast spells from anywhere other than your hand. {R}{G} FORETELL Something strange and hidden is in the air. Lay your spells aside for later and revel in mystery. {G}{W} LONE WOLF Your lonely attackers thrive in solitude with buffs and boosts. {W}{B} ALONE Spread your attackers out—Operations and lone wolf triggers are your weapons. {B}{G} OPERATIONS Outgrind your opponents with stealthy attackers and recursion. {G}{U} OPERATIONS Your hardened agents adapt and overcome in the face of fresh battles. {U}{R} FORETELL Hold a spell in secret like the threat of mass destruction, and out-bluff your foe. {R}{W} NONCREATURES Civilians mean nothing to you. Forge victory by casting nnoncreature spells to succeed.
